languages.text: "Тисифона сделала все, чтобы Дом служил Богу-Императору и направлял Человечество во тьме средь звезд. Эта цель в ее глазах... оправдывала любые жертвы — и среди ксеносов, и среди ее же подчиненных".

"Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."
languages.original_text: "Тисифона сделала все, чтобы Дом служил Богу-Императору и направлял Человечество во тьме средь звезд. Эта цель в ее глазах... оправдывала любые жертвы — и среди ксеносов, и среди ее же подчиненных".

traits.locale_text: "Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

"Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

"Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

"Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

languages.text: “提西福涅尽她所能，确保家族能为神皇服务，能在群星之间的黑暗中引导人类。在她看来，只要是为了这个目标……一切牺牲都是合理的，无论是异形，还是她自己的臣民。”
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

traits.locale_text: “提西福涅尽她所能，确保家族能为神皇服务，能在群星之间的黑暗中引导人类。在她看来，只要是为了这个目标……一切牺牲都是合理的，无论是异形，还是她自己的臣民。”

languages.text: « Tisiphone a fait tout ce qui était en son pouvoir pour s'assurer que sa maison serve au mieux l'Empereur-Dieu et guide l'humanité à travers les ténèbres du vide galactique. Et pour atteindre ses objectifs, elle n'a reculé devant aucun sacrifice... aussi bien parmi les xénos que ses propres vassaux. »
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

traits.locale_text: « Tisiphone a fait tout ce qui était en son pouvoir pour s'assurer que sa maison serve au mieux l'Empereur-Dieu et guide l'humanité à travers les ténèbres du vide galactique. Et pour atteindre ses objectifs, elle n'a reculé devant aucun sacrifice... aussi bien parmi les xénos que ses propres vassaux. »

languages.text: «Tisiphone hizo todo para asegurarse de que su casa servía al Dios Emperador y guiaba a la Humanidad por la oscuridad entre las estrellas. Ante sus ojos, esa meta... justificaba cualquier sacrificio, tanto de xenos como de sus propios vasallos».
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

traits.locale_text: «Tisiphone hizo todo para asegurarse de que su casa servía al Dios Emperador y guiaba a la Humanidad por la oscuridad entre las estrellas. Ante sus ojos, esa meta... justificaba cualquier sacrificio, tanto de xenos como de sus propios vasallos».

languages.text: 「ティシフォンは、一族が神帝陛下に仕え、星々の暗闇の中で人類を導くために万全を期してあらゆることを行いました。彼女の目には、この目標のためなら…異種族だろうと家臣だろうと、どんな犠牲をも正当化できるように映っていたのです」
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

traits.locale_text: 「ティシフォンは、一族が神帝陛下に仕え、星々の暗闇の中で人類を導くために万全を期してあらゆることを行いました。彼女の目には、この目標のためなら…異種族だろうと家臣だろうと、どんな犠牲をも正当化できるように映っていたのです」

languages.text: "Tisiphone hat alles getan, um dafür zu sorgen, dass das Haus dem Gottimperator dient und die Menschheit durch die Dunkelheit zwischen den Stern führt. In ihren Augen, hat dieses Ziel ... jedes Opfer gerechtfertigt, sowohl unter den Xenos als auch unter ihren Vasallen."
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

traits.locale_text: "Tisiphone hat alles getan, um dafür zu sorgen, dass das Haus dem Gottimperator dient und die Menschheit durch die Dunkelheit zwischen den Stern führt. In ihren Augen, hat dieses Ziel ... jedes Opfer gerechtfertigt, sowohl unter den Xenos als auch unter ihren Vasallen."

languages.original_text: "Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

languages.text: "Tisiphone, Hane'nin Tanrı İmparator'a hizmet ettiğinden emin olmak için her şeyi yaptı, yıldızlar arasındaki karanlıkta İnsanlığa yol gösterdi. Onun gözünde bu amaç... Zenolar ve kendi vasallarından feda edilen her şeyi haklı çıkarıyordu."
languages.original_text: "Tisiphone did everything to ensure that the House served the God-Emperor and guided Humanity in the darkness among the stars. In her eyes, this goal... justified any sacrifice, both among the xenos and among her own vassals."

traits.locale_text: "Tisiphone, Hane'nin Tanrı İmparator'a hizmet ettiğinden emin olmak için her şeyi yaptı ve yıldızların arasındaki karanlıkta İnsanlığa yol gösterdi. Onun gözünde bu amaç... Zenolar ve kendi vasallarından kurban edilen her şeyi haklı çıkarıyordu."
